1AnyDeskDownload선택하면기본브라우저가파일다운로드를실행: 1 If you select AnyDeskDownload, the default browser will execute file download
2-1(Chrome브라우저)다운로드완료후파일명선택: 2-1 (Chrome browser) Select file name after download is complete
2-2(Edge브라우저)다운로드완료후파일열기선택: 2-2 (Edge browser) Select open file after download is complete
4원격지원담당자가원격허용요청하면승인선택: 4 If the remote support manager requests remote permission, select Approve
3파일실행후표시되는번호를원격지원담당자에게전달: 3 After executing the file, convey the number displayed to the remote support person
토,일요일/공휴일휴무: Closed on Saturdays, Sundays and public holidays
업데이트가있습니다종료후재실행해주세요: There is an update Please quit and rerun
삭제하시겠습니까?: Are you sure you want to delete?
로그인중인사원의정보만수정가능합니다: Only the information of employees who are logged in can be modified
해당품목과연계된단가/포장도같이삭제됩니다: The unit price/packaging associated with the item will also be deleted
저장후단가포장추가: Add unit price packaging after saving
수정할자료를선택해주십시오: Please select the data you wish to edit
삭제할자료를선택해주십시오: Please select the data you want to delete
참조할자료를선택해주십시오: Please select the material you wish to refer to
해당품목이투입된상위Bom이존재하지않습니다: The parent Bom in which the item is inserted does not exist
미발주입하품목일괄추가: Bulk addition of unreleased injection items
수주수량을출하수량으로변경: Change order quantity to shipped quantity
출고수량이존재하므로삭제할수없습니다: Since the delivery quantity exists, it cannot be deleted
출하마감전반입수정(라벨재고): Modification of transfer before shipment deadline (label inventory)
출하마감전반입추가(라벨재고): Added carry-in before shipment deadline (label inventory)
추가할항목을체크해주십시오: Please check the items you want to add
해당로트는검사이력이없습니다: There is no inspection history for this lot
해당로트는불량이력이없습니다: This lot has no history of defects
해당로트를자재로사용한생산로트가존재하지않습니다: There is no production lot using this lot as material
수정할계획을선택하십시오: Select the plan you want to modify
등록할금형을선택해주십시오: Please select the mold to register
의뢰담당자명: Name of person in charge of request
프로젝트(수작업)생산계획일괄등록: Bulk registration of project (manual) production plan
There is an update. Please quit and rerun.
Check and save the dimension items to be added to the item.
시스템에서사용할공정들을체크후저장하세요.(공정관련메뉴추가는피디엠테크에문의): Check and save the processes to be used in the system. (Contact PDMTECH for adding process-related menus)
분류별품목추가시기본값을선택후저장하세요.(이미추가된품목에는반영되지않음): When adding items by category, select the default value and save it. (It will not be reflected in already added items.)
시스템에서사용할라벨디자인을체크후저장하세요.(디자인추가는피디엠테크에문의): Check and save the label design to be used in the system. (Contact PDMTECH to add designs)
시스템에사용할라벨번호규칙을체크후저장하세요.(번호규칙추가는피디엠테크에문의): Check and save the label number rules to be used in the system. (Contact PDMTECH to add number rules)

불합격현황조치결과이미지디렉토리: Failure Status Action Result Image Directory
